description: This simple slow cooked veggie spread is delicious served with crusty bread for a snack or easy entree.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Eggplant Spread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large red capsicums, cored and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 3 tablespoons of oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the eggplant for 15-20 minutes, stirring often, until tender.
In a separate pan on medium heat, heat the remaining oil and cook the carrots, capsicums, onions and tomatoes for 10 minutes.

Tip the vegetable mixes into the pan with the eggplant and stir in the parsley. Season generously. Reduce the heat to low and cook for 1 hour, stirring occasionally, until stewed, chunky and spreadable in consistency.
